scripts.python:check: python --version && python -c "import sys; exit(0 if sys.version_info >= (3, 11) and sys.version_info < (3, 12) else 1)" || (echo '❌ ERROR: This project requires Python 3.11' && echo 'To fix: pyenv install 3.11.13 && pyenv local 3.11.13' && exit 1)
scripts.python:setup: npm run python:check && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -e .
scripts.test:mcp: npm run python:check && cd MCP && python -m pytest plexus_fastmcp_server_test.py --cov=plexus_fastmcp_server --cov-report=term -v
scripts.clean:python: find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf htmlcov/ .coverage .pytest_cache/ 2>/dev/null || true
